author: Reuters
title: In Brazil, a great-grandmother, 97, is oldest coronavirus survivor
description: In Brazil, 97-year-old Brazilian Gina Dal Colleto left a hospital in Sao Paolo on Sunday after battling coronavirus, her recovery a ray of hope in the country with the most cases in the region.
content:
RIO DE JANEIRO When 97-year-old Brazilian Gina Dal Colleto was hospitalized on April 1 with coronavirus symptoms, few could have thought she would survive the deadly virus.
On Sunday, however, Dal Colleto was pushed in a wheelchair out of Sao Paulos Vila Nov… [+2151 chars]
